text: A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, â€œKweli ngunakummalanjilanga kunnungu na shilambolyo pushiijiyebha ya ambi, Mwana juka Mundu shatame pa shitengu shakwe sha ukonjelo, numbe mmanganya likumi limo na bhabhili nngagwilenje nne, shintamangane mwiitengu likumi limo na ibhili nnikwaukumulanga makabhila likumi limo na gabhili ga Ishilaeli.
